welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Dionisio, Philippines! This charming coastal city is known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Dionisio has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal in Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is primarily used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal in the airport, mainly used by Cebu Pacific and its partner airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal in the airport, mainly used by regional and domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
